description: This file defines a client for interacting with the Newsdata.io API, including functions for fetching news headlines with retries, parameter building, and environment variable handling. It exports a main function getTopHeadlines to query news data with various filters.

methods.name: fetchWithRetry(url, opts = {}, retries = 2, backoffMs = 600)
methods.description: Performs an HTTP fetch with exponential backoff retries.

methods.name: buildParams(params)
methods.description: Builds URL query parameters from a given object, including API key if available.

methods.name: getTopHeadlines({ category, q, language, country, from_date, to_date, page = 1 } = {})
methods.description: Fetches top news headlines based on provided filters; includes fallback mock data if API key is missing.

ctags.name: getTopHeadlines
ctags.pattern: /^export async function getTopHeadlines({ category, q, language, country, from_date, to_date, page/
ctags.signature: ({ category, q, language, country, from_date, to_date, page = 1 } = {})
